trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control that displays a frame around a group of controls with an optional caption.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo do Windows que apresenta uma moldura à volta de um grupo de controlos com uma legenda opcional.

trans-unit.source: The GroupBox displays a frame around a group of controls with or without a caption.
trans-unit.target: O GroupBox apresenta uma moldura à volta de um grupo de controlos com ou sem uma legenda.

trans-unit.source: Use a GroupBox to logically group a collection of controls on a form.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um GroupBox para agrupar logicamente uma coleção de controlos num formulário.

trans-unit.source: The group box is a container control that can be used to define groups of controls.
trans-unit.target: A caixa de grupo é um controlo de contentor que pode ser utilizado para definir os grupos de controlos.

trans-unit.source: The typical use for a group box is to contain a logical group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: É a utilização normal para uma caixa de grupo que contém um grupo lógico de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: If you have two group boxes, each of which contain several option buttons (also known as radio buttons), each group of buttons is mutually exclusive, setting one option value per group.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver duas caixas de grupo, cada um dos quais contêm vários botões de opção (também conhecido como botões de opção), cada grupo de botões é valor mutuamente exclusivos, definição uma opção por grupo.

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the GroupBox by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar controlos para o GroupBox utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only controls that are contained within the GroupBox control can be selected or receive focus.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Apenas os controlos que são contidos no controlo GroupBox podem ser selecionados ou receber o foco.

trans-unit.source: The complete GroupBox itself cannot be selected or receive focus.
trans-unit.target: O GroupBox completa em si não pode ser selecionado ou receber o foco.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como este controlo responde ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>métodos, consulte o seguinte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Membros: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GroupBox cannot display a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: O GroupBox não consegue apresentar uma barra de deslocamento.

trans-unit.source: If you need a control similar to a GroupBox that can contain a scroll bar, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de um controlo semelhante a um GroupBox que pode conter uma barra de deslocamento, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property is set to `false` when a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> is created.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>propriedade está definida como `false` quando um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>é criado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: The group box has an initial height of 100 pixels and width of 200 pixels.
trans-unit.target: A caixa de grupo tem uma altura inicial de 100 pixéis e largura de 200 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control will allow drag-and-drop operations and events to be used.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo irá permitir operações de arrastar e largar e eventos a serem utilizadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow drag-and-drop operations and events to be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para permitir operações de arrastar e largar e eventos a serem utilizadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> resizes based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> redimensiona com base no respetivo conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> automatically resizes based on its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> será redimensionado automaticamente com base no respetivo conteúdo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> behaves when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> comporta-se quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>propriedade está ativada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador clica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objecto de acessibilidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador de controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador do controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> structure that contains the default padding settings for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> estrutura que contém a predefinição do preenchimento definições para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default padding indicates the padding on each side of the control is three pixels.
trans-unit.target: O preenchimento predefinida indica que o preenchimento em cada lado do controlo é três pixéis.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> with all its edges set to three pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> com todos os respetivos contornos definidos como três pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a rectangle that represents the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um retângulo que representa as dimensões do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> with the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> com as dimensões do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the group box control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o aspecto do estilo simples do controlo de caixa de grupo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> with a FlatStyle value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> does not receive mouse events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>com um valor de FlatStyle de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>não receber eventos de rato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador prime tempo chave o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: Porque um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>controlo não é possível obter o foco, este evento é desencadeado nunca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador prime tempo chave o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: Porque um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>controlo não é possível obter o foco, este evento é desencadeado nunca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a key while the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador liberta tempo chave o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot get focus, this event is never raised.
trans-unit.target: Porque um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>controlo não é possível obter o foco, este evento é desencadeado nunca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador clica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo com o rato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> controlo com o rato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador prime um botão do rato enquanto o ponteiro do rato está sobre o controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato entra o controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do rato deixa o controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador move o ponteiro do rato sobre o controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a mouse button while the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador liberta um botão do rato enquanto o ponteiro do rato está sobre o controlo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caráter mnemónica.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O carácter a processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter foi processado como uma mnemónica ser exigido pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Scales the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref> by the specified factor and scaling instruction.
trans-unit.target: Escalas de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref> pelo fator especificado e dimensionamento instrução.

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this method will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: Se o controlo de nível superior, este método não sejam dimensionadas de localização do controlo.

trans-unit.source: This method does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: Este método não é elementos subordinados ou o tamanho dos controlos de tamanho automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode omitir o dimensionamento em qualquer direção alterando o valor da `specified` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> that indicates the height and width of the scaled control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> que indica a altura e largura do controlo expandido.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values that indicates how the control should be scaled.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valores que indica como o controlo deve ser ampliado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can press the TAB key to give the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode premir a tecla TAB para dar o foco para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the TabStop property to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: Embora o que pode definir a propriedade TabStop para `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>controlo não pode receber o foco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow the user to press the TAB key to give the focus to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para permitir que o utilizador prima a tecla TAB para dar o foco para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado este controlo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é sem nome.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina se deve utilizar o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> classe ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) ou o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"> </xref> classe ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) para compor o texto

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: O `UseCompatibleTextRendering` propriedade destina-se a fornecer visual compatibilidade entre controlos de formulários do Windows utilizando o texto que compor o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe e [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] aplicações desempenhar composições do texto personalizado utilizando a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, se a aplicação não está a ser atualizada de [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], é recomendável deixar a opção `UseCompatibleTextRendering` definido como o valor predefinido de `false`.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] com base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe foi introduzida no [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] para melhorar o desempenho, colocar o texto parecer melhor e melhorar o suporte para tipos de letra internacionais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: Em versões anteriores do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] com base <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe foi utilizada para executar todas as composição de texto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]calcula o espaçamento de carateres e o word encapsulamento de forma diferente de [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: Numa aplicação do Windows Forms que utiliza o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe para compor o texto, isto pode fazer com que o texto de controlos que utilizam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>apareça diferentes a partir do texto na aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: Para resolver este incompatibilidade, pode definir o `UseCompatibleTextRendering` propriedade `true` para um controlo específico.

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para definir `UseCompatibleTextRendering` para `true` para todos os controlos suportados na aplicação, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método com um parâmetro de `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> classe deve ser utilizada para desempenhar composições do texto para compatibilidade com versões 1.0 e 1.1.

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: do .NET Framework; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
